languages.text: [Накрыть ладонь Кассии своей] "Если бы мне кто-то сказал, что однажды я потеряю голову от чувств — я бы никогда не поверил".

traits.locale_text: [Накрыть ладонь Кассии своей] "Если бы мне кто-то сказал, что однажды я потеряю голову от чувств — я бы никогда не поверил".

languages.text: [Cover Cassia's hand with your own] "If someone had told me that one day I would take leave of my senses like this, I never would have believed it."
languages.original_text: [Накрыть ладонь Кассии своей] "Если бы мне кто-то сказал, что однажды я потеряю голову от чувств — я бы никогда не поверил".

traits.locale_text: [Cover Cassia's hand with your own] "If someone had told me that one day I would take leave of my senses like this, I never would have believed it."
[Cover Cassia's hand with your own] "If someone had told me that one day I would take leave of my senses like this, I never would have believed it."
[Cover Cassia's hand with your own] "If someone had told me that one day I would take leave of my senses like this, I never would have believed it."
[Cover Cassia's hand with your own] "If someone had told me that one day I would take leave of my senses like this, I never would have believed it."

languages.text: [Cubrir la mano de Cassia con la tuya] «Si alguien me hubiera dicho que algún día perdería la cabeza de este modo, jamás lo habría creído».
languages.original_text: [Cover Cassia's hand with your own] "If someone had told me that one day I would take leave of my senses like this, I never would have believed it."

traits.locale_text: [Cubrir la mano de Cassia con la tuya] «Si alguien me hubiera dicho que algún día perdería la cabeza de este modo, jamás lo habría creído».

languages.text: [カシアの手を自分の手で隠す]「いつか私がこのような感情を抱くことになるだろうと誰かが言ったとしても、私は信じなかっただろう」
languages.original_text: [Cover Cassia's hand with your own] "If someone had told me that one day I would take leave of my senses like this, I never would have believed it."

traits.locale_text: [カシアの手を自分の手で隠す]「いつか私がこのような感情を抱くことになるだろうと誰かが言ったとしても、私は信じなかっただろう」

languages.text: [握住卡西娅的手]“如果以前有人告诉我，说我某一天会像此刻一样失去理智，我是绝对不会相信的。”
languages.original_text: [Cover Cassia's hand with your own] "If someone had told me that one day I would take leave of my senses like this, I never would have believed it."

traits.locale_text: [握住卡西娅的手]“如果以前有人告诉我，说我某一天会像此刻一样失去理智，我是绝对不会相信的。”

languages.text: [Prendre la main de Cassia dans la vôtre] « Si quelqu'un m'avait dit un jour que je perdrais ainsi la raison, je ne l'aurais jamais cru. »
languages.original_text: [Cover Cassia's hand with your own] "If someone had told me that one day I would take leave of my senses like this, I never would have believed it."

traits.locale_text: [Prendre la main de Cassia dans la vôtre] « Si quelqu'un m'avait dit un jour que je perdrais ainsi la raison, je ne l'aurais jamais cru. »

languages.text: [Cassias Hand mit deiner eigenen bedecken] "Wenn mir jemand gesagt hätte, dass ich eines Tages derart die Vernunft verlieren würde, hätte ich es nie geglaubt."
languages.original_text: [Cover Cassia's hand with your own] "If someone had told me that one day I would take leave of my senses like this, I never would have believed it."

traits.locale_text: [Cassias Hand mit deiner eigenen bedecken] "Wenn mir jemand gesagt hätte, dass ich eines Tages derart die Vernunft verlieren würde, hätte ich es nie geglaubt."

languages.text: [Cassia'nın elinin üstüne kendi elini koy] "Birileri çıkıp bana bir gün aklımın böylesine başımdan gideceğini söyleseydi asla inanmazdım."
languages.original_text: [Cover Cassia's hand with your own] "If someone had told me that one day I would take leave of my senses like this, I never would have believed it."

traits.locale_text: [Cassia'nın elinin üstüne kendi elini koy] "Birileri çıkıp bana bir gün aklımın böylesine başımdan gideceğini söyleseydi asla inanmazdım."
